name: react-stripe-elements

0.0.2.name: react-stripe-elements
0.0.2.description: This project is a thin React wrapper around Stripe.js and Stripe Elements that allows you to use Elements in React without needing to manage Stripe state and the lifecycle of Elements.

scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.js dist/react-stripe-elements.js --config webpack.config.prod.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/react-stripe-elements.min.js --config webpack.config.prod.js
scripts.build: yarn run lint && yarn run flow && yarn run build:commonjs && yarn run build:es && yarn run build:umd && yarn run build:umd:min
scripts.prepublish: yarn run clean && yarn run build

0.0.3.name: react-stripe-elements
0.0.3.description: React components that help you quickly add Stripe Elements to your React app.

scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.js dist/react-stripe-elements.js --config webpack.config.prod.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/react-stripe-elements.min.js --config webpack.config.prod.js
scripts.build: yarn run lint && yarn run flow && yarn run build:commonjs && yarn run build:es && yarn run build:umd && yarn run build:umd:min
scripts.prepublish: yarn run clean && yarn run build

scripts.prettier: prettier --single-quote --trailing-comma es5 --bracket-spacing false --parser flow src/**/*.js demo/**/*.js --write
scripts.prettier-list-different: prettier --single-quote --trailing-comma es5 --bracket-spacing false --parser flow src/**/*.js demo/**/*.js --list-different
scripts.prepublish: yarn run clean && yarn run build
